Phoneme embedding training features
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. py:module:: langsim.modules.word2vecf.phoneme_embed_features

+------------+--------------------------------------------------+
| Path       | langsim.modules.word2vecf.phoneme_embed_features |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------+
| Executable | yes                                              |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------+

Generates features for training phoneme embeddings using word2vecf.


Inputs
======

+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name   | Type(s)                                                                                                        |
+========+================================================================================================================+
| corpus | :class:`SegmentedLinesDocumentTypeTarredCorpus <pimlico.datatypes.tar.SegmentedLinesDocumentTypeTarredCorpus>` |
+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Outputs
=======

+-----------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| Name            | Type(s)                                              |
+=================+======================================================+
| word2vecf_input | :class:`~langsim.datatypes.word2vecf.Word2VecFInput` |
+-----------------+------------------------------------------------------+

Options
=======

+-----------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------+
| Name      | Description                                                                                                                   | Type |
+===========+===============================================================================================================================+======+
| max_n     | Maximum length of n-gram before or after a phoneme to include as a feature. Default: 3                                        | int  |
+-----------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------+
| min_count | Minimum frequency of a vocabulary item or context feature for it to be included in the corresponding vocabulary. Default: 100 | int  |
+-----------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------+
